abstract: A view modifier that controls the frame sizing and content alignment behavior for `RealityView`

declaration.code: @MainActor @preconcurrency func realityViewLayoutBehavior(_ layoutOption: RealityViewLayoutOption) -> some View

overview:
## Discussion

This modifier is only accounted for after the end of the `make` closure. It isn’t checked on any calls to the `update` closure.

See `RealityViewLayoutOption` for a list of options to pass into `realityViewLayoutBehavior(_:)`.
